body: Lauri comes across Badilisha Poetry Radio, which features African poets: "I've managed to lose an hour listening to poetry by African poets both here and abroad. I got captured by Karin Schmike's poem Shamshack about the two-faced, false concern of politicians."
original_body: Lauri comes across Badilisha Poetry Radio, which features African poets: "I've managed to lose an hour listening to poetry by African poets both here and abroad. I got captured by Karin Schmike's poem Shamshack about the two-faced, false concern of politicians."
title: Africa: Online Radio for African Poets

sentence: Lauri comes across Badilisha Poetry Radio, which features African poets: "I've managed to lose an hour listening to poetry by African poets both here and abroad.
I got captured by Karin Schmike's poem Shamshack about the two-faced, false concern of politicians."
